basics.name: Freelance IT Consultant
basics.label: Information Technology Specialist/Consultant
basics.summary: Highly skilled, results-driven Information Technology Specialist/Consultant with experience in business operations, infrastructure management, software/hardware support, high/low end PC and Microsoft Server administration, and software development.

work.name: Freelance IT Consultant
work.summary: Worked closely with technology vendors and distributors. Designed and implemented PC and laptop re-imaging process. Provided technical support and problem resolution.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Acting as liaison between departments, developing and managing project plans, increasing efficiency of technologies and processes, executing business plan, training employees, upgrading network hardware, advising and assisting in IT infrastructure etc.

work.name: City
work.summary: Provided consultation for business software and hardware solutions. Acted as liaison between clients, vendors and product distributors. Configured LAN's and WLAN's. Designed, tested, installed and monitored client networks etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided technical support for all network applications. Served as an operating system expert. Improved reliability of education software, systems and databases etc.
